ComicInfo.Summary: Deathpool #5: Detective Lee Kim tries to uncover the whereabouts of notorious assassin Ian Nottingham and discover why police officer Sara Pezzini is working with him. Ian and Sara take on a helicopter assault by Level 42 but Sara rejects combining the power of the Witchblade with Ian's power to form a giant golden dragon.
